name: 马尔科姆·X
bio: 20世纪最具影响力的黑人领袖之一，马丁·路德·金非暴力路线的强力对照。早年入狱，在狱中加入伊斯兰国度组织，出狱后成为最具感染力的黑人权力演说家。他拒绝'融入白人社会'，主张黑人自力更生、自我防卫。后期思想转向温和，1965年被暗杀。他的自传影响了一代又一代人。
bio_en: Influential African American leader and spokesman for the Nation of Islam who advocated Black self-reliance and self-defense. His autobiography became a classic of American literature. After his pilgrimage to Mecca, he embraced a more inclusive vision of racial justice. Assassinated in New York in 1965.

personalEvents.title: '以任何必要的手段'

personalEvents.description_en: Delivers radical speeches advocating Black people's right to self-defense

personalEvents.title: 离开伊斯兰国度
personalEvents.description: 与伊斯兰国度决裂，前往麦加朝觐后思想转向温和
personalEvents.description_en: Splits from the Nation of Islam; pilgrimage to Mecca transforms his views toward inclusivity

personalEvents.title: 遭暗杀
personalEvents.description: 在纽约演讲时被伊斯兰国度成员枪杀
personalEvents.description_en: Assassinated by Nation of Islam members while giving a speech in New York
